jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
● Design an overall regional merchant strategy (encompassing both hunting and farming motion), followed by implementation and execution of the plan to ensure business objectives are achieved 
● Oversee and manage the performance of a team of Account Executives, including providing regular coaching/mentoring 
● Build and maintain relationships with the network of Small & Medium Businesses in the district 
● Work with relevant stakeholders (e.g. Marketing, etc.) to ensure that sales strategies and merchant activities are aligned with the overall regional and nation-wide company objectives 
● Prepare sales forecasts and budgets, set transaction targets in areas such as product mix, sales volume, market shares, and new business development 
● Identify new sales opportunities within existing merchant accounts by up-selling and cross-selling existing products 
● Translate consumer behavior, market insight, field situation, and market trend to Regional & Head office to refine the overall region strategy

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Willing and able to relocate to 6 big cities GOJEK Org
  • Minimum of bachelor’s degree from top local or overseas universities
  • Minimum of 7 years of experience within mid-to-senior management function. Preferable industries: unicorn tech-company, top multinational FMCG, SMB Banking and big-3 Telco company
  • Preferably native or has spent significant time (>2 years) in representatives’ area; strong network and knowledge about the district
  • Has an existing relationship or able to bridge, develop and maintain a good relationship with a key partner such as but not limited to local/regional government stakeholders, 3rd party partners, merchant associations, communities, etc
  • Possess strong business sense and have a good understanding of the markets, customers, and competitors
  • Possess strong leadership and interpersonal skills, experienced in managing a big team, as well as strong in people development and mentoring/coaching
  • Possess strong written & communication skills, fluent in English and Bahasa Indonesia
  • Fact-based/number-oriented individual, who is comfortable working under pressure in a fast-paced and ambiguous environment
